templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[merchant_account]" value="{$profile.options.merchant_account}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_pg_wayforpay_merchant_account') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:passwordboxrow name="options[secret_key]" value="{$profile.options.secret_key}" type="password" label="{{ phrase('wh1_pg_wayforpay_secret_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:passwordboxrow>
